issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
tiAdmob latest version not displaying ads on iOS 8.
It say  "<Google:HTML> You are currently using version 6.12.0 of the SDK, which doesn't officially support iOS 8. Please consider updating your SDK to the most recent sdk version, 7.1.0, to get iOS 8 support, including a fix for smart banner rendering in landscape mode. The latest SDK can be downloaded from http://goo.gl/iGzfsP. A full list of release notes is available at https://developers.google.com/mobile-ads-sdk/docs/admob/ios/rel-notes."

Simple sample of admob  module.
fields.summary: TiAdmob Module admob sdk issue for iOS 8.2

comments.body:
Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. It looks like the feature "*ti.admob*" displaying ads on iOS  is working fine for me. I tested this using the studio build: 4.1.1.201507141126,*iOS SDK: 8.4* and TiSDK 4.1.0 GA .
I recommend you upgrade *[ti.admob|https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.admob]* to the latest build and let us know if you get the error again.
I will mark this ticket as "resolved" since I can't reproduce it. However, feel free to reopen with additional information if you notice otherwise.
Thanks
